hero.title: Find Your Perfect Home
hero.subtitle: Discover amazing properties for rent and sale. Your dream home is just a search away.

search.title: Search Results
search.adjustCriteria: Try adjusting your search criteria or browse all properties.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy will inform you about how we look after your personal data when you visit our website and tell you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We may collect, use, store and transfer different kinds of personal data about you which we have grouped together as follows: Identity Data, Contact Data, Technical Data, Usage Data, and Marketing and Communications Data.

howWeUseYourData.title: How We Use Your Data
howWeUseYourData.content: We will only use your personal data when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal data to provide and improve our services, manage our relationship with you, and send you marketing communications.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal data from being accidentally lost, used or accessed in an unauthorized way, altered or disclosed.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at privacy@example.com.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: These Terms of Service govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

accountTerms.title: Account Terms
accountTerms.content: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for all activities that occur under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: You agree not to use the service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You must not transmit any worms or viruses or any code of a destructive nature.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: In no event shall our company be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at legal@example.com.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer by websites that you visit. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to the site owners.

howWeUseCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUseCookies.content: We use cookies to understand how you use our site and to improve your experience, including personalizing content and storing your preferences.

typesOfCookies.title: Types of Cookies We Use
typesOfCookies.content: We use both session cookies (which expire once you close your web browser) and persistent cookies (which stay on your device for a set period of time).

managingCookies.title: Managing Cookies
managingCookies.content: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at privacy@example.com.
